questions.question: In March 2020, the US Treasury announced a major change to taxes. What was it?

choices.answer: New tax filing deadline of June 15, 2020
New tax filing deadline of July 15, 2020
All tax payments delayed until 2021
Tax payments less than $1M due in 2021

questions.question: Why did the government extend the tax filing deadline by 90 days in 2020?

choices.answer: Due to the closure of the IRS until June 1st
Due to rising public demands
Due to the economic impact of coronavirus
Due to bugs in the AI system used by the IRS

questions.question: Those who file taxes after July 15, 2020 without applying for an extension...

choices.answer: will need to file in person at the US Treasury
will be fine, the IRS is very understanding
will need to include reasons for being late
will be charged a penalty

questions.question: Governments are beginning to use AI to process taxes for all these reasons, except:

choices.answer: to detect tax evasion
to respond to taxpayer questions
to sort the tax forms alphabetically
to make themselves more efficient
